word_mean: 肌〔原纤维〕节，肌小节：为肌纤维的收缩单位，肌节是由肌原纤维的Z带分隔而成的等距离重复单位
肌节横纹肌的微细结构，可见明带与暗带相间排列，明带中央为Z线，两个相间的Z线之间的区域为肌节。

sentence.Network_en: Instead, sarcomere shortening occurs when the thin filaments'slide " by the thick filaments.
sentence.Network_cn: 此外, 肌节的缩短发生于细肌丝沿粗肌丝“滑行 ” 之际.

sentence.Network_en: These genes encode sarcomere proteins that, when mutated, cause adult - onset cardiomyopathies.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些基因编码的肌节蛋白质, 当其突变时会导致成人心肌疾病.

sentence.Network_en: Background - Titin is a giant protein crucial for the assembly and elasticity of the sarcomere.
sentence.Network_cn: 肌联蛋白是一种巨型蛋白,对肌小节的组成和弹性有重要作用.

sarcolemma 肌纤维膜sarcomere 肌节; 肌原纤维节sarcoplasm 肌质

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from Greek sarx, sark- 'flesh' + meros 'part'
